content.question: In its description of the condition of the Crimean Tatars, the second paragraph most directly provides evidence of the influence of which of the following?

choices.label: The concept of the civilizing mission
The racial theory of Social Darwinism

content.answer: The concept of the civilizing mission

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain how a specific historical development or process is situated within a broader historical context.
